text: Hi <@U04AQA0QM8E>, I was also just looking into retrieving an object's associations in a custom coded action. My solution was to leverage the HubSpot API, but is there a round-a-bout way to access them via the included properties pane? Perhaps in the 'edit available data' interface? Thanks in advance!!

<@U06U9L3SPQU> You’re able to access specific associated objects and their fields via the “Edit Available Data” interface, but you’re limited to the most recently created, most recently updated, or first created associated objects.

You can narrow down further if you only select a specific association label, but there isn’t a way to pull in an arbitrary associated object, or a full collection of associated objects without using the Associations API.
That's what I was afraid of, but thank you very much for sharing your knowledge!
